com.mewna.catnip.shard

Class CatnipShard

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.core.AbstractVerticle
      • com.mewna.catnip.shard.CatnipShard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.vertx.core.Verticle

    public class CatnipShard
extends io.vertx.core.AbstractVerticle
    A catnip shard encapsulates a single websocket connection to Discord's real-time gateway. Shards are implemented as vert.x verticles and should be un/deployed as such; see DefaultShardManager and AbstractShardManager for more.

    Shards are controlled by sending messages over the vert.x event bus; it is NOT recommended that you store a reference to a shard verticle anywhere. To send a message to a shard:

    1. Get the shard's control address with ShardAddress.computeAddress(ShardAddress.CONTROL, id).
    2. Send a ShardControlMessage to it.
    Since:
    8/31/18.
    Author:
    amy
